extendedInfo.description: Save money on your electricity bill by having the time-of-use (TOU) billing period & rates at your fingertips anytime, anyplace!Ontario Time of Use is an app specifically designed for residents of Ontario who subject to time-of-use electricity rates.- Instantly know the current time-of-use period- Change the date & time to view other periods- View current electrical rates for off peak, mid peak and on peak- Daily timeline view of when periods start and end- Simple easy to use designUsing this app you have easy access to the time-of-use period and rates, making it easier to plan when to use electricity.  Now you don't have to look for those inserts you get in with your electricity bills or wonder if the times and rates on the fridge magnet from your hydro company are still current.Outsmart your smart meter with Ontario Time of Use!

reviews.title: Worth every penny!
reviews.comment: Love this app! For someone who is constantly on the go every day, it\'s great to have this information at my fingertips and on my phone which I take everywhere with me! Whether I\'m running home to throw in the laundry or planning meals ahead of time for my family, the 99 cents it costs is well worth the money I save in hydro costs each month!
reviews.author: Candy Dinsmore

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great app. I would recommend everyone to dowload this app.
reviews.author: Mike Lowe
